title: The WiMAX Stick is connected to network, but can not surfing Internet
answer:
(1)Check the signal is good or not, and whether the WiMAX Stick is connected to WiMAX network, justify it from two icons in the bottom of PC suite
(2)Try to open different websites or surfing Internet in other time, sometimes there is an Internet jam
(3)Open【Network Connections】and check the Local Area Connection has obtained IP address
(4)Sometimes a PPPoE connection should be established, and relevant username and password is also necessary, you can call your service provider for help
(5)Try uninstall the PC suite and reinstall it again
